Title: 143: Why Sensors and the Internet of Things are Becoming A Critical Part of Data Science
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Senior Consultant of Data Science at b.telligent, Dr. Andreas Hopfgartner. You will hear about the "Internet of Things", Sensor Data, and their integration into our daily lives; you will also learn about the different skills, techniques, and the future of some of the tools used in Data Science; and also learn a systematic and structured approach to breaking into a Data Science career.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/143
